sql_functions.find_similar_memories:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION find_similar_memories(
    p_memory_id TEXT,
    p_similarity_threshold FLOAT DEFAULT 0.75,
    p_limit INTEGER DEFAULT 10
) RETURNS TABLE (
    similar_memory_id TEXT,
    similarity_score FLOAT,
    content_preview TEXT
) AS $$
DECLARE
    target_embedding VECTOR(1536);
BEGIN
    SELECT embedding INTO target_embedding 
    FROM crew_memories 
    WHERE id = p_memory_id;
    
    IF target_embedding IS NULL THEN
        RETURN;
    END IF;
    
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        cm.id,
        1 - (cm.embedding <=> target_embedding) as similarity_score,
        LEFT(cm.content, 100) as content_preview
    FROM crew_memories cm
    WHERE cm.id != p_memory_id
      AND cm.embedding IS NOT NULL
      AND 1 - (cm.embedding <=> target_embedding) >= p_similarity_threshold
    ORDER BY cm.embedding <=> target_embedding
    LIMIT p_limit;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
sql_functions.search_memories_by_crew:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION search_memories_by_crew(
    p_crew_member TEXT,
    p_query_embedding VECTOR(1536),
    p_similarity_threshold FLOAT DEFAULT 0.75,
    p_limit INTEGER DEFAULT 10
) RETURNS TABLE (
    memory_id TEXT,
    content TEXT,
    similarity_score FLOAT,
    memory_type TEXT,
    importance_score FLOAT
) AS $$
BEGIN
    RETURN QUERY
    SELECT 
        cm.id,
        cm.content,
        1 - (cm.embedding <=> p_query_embedding) as similarity_score,
        cm.memory_type,
        cm.importance_score
    FROM crew_memories cm
    WHERE cm.crew_member = p_crew_member
      AND cm.embedding IS NOT NULL
      AND 1 - (cm.embedding <=> p_query_embedding) >= p_similarity_threshold
    ORDER BY cm.embedding <=> p_query_embedding
    LIMIT p_limit;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

steps.title: Access N8N Dashboard
steps.description: Go to https://n8n.pbradygeorgen.com and login with your credentials

steps.title: Import RAG Workflows
steps.description: Import each generated workflow JSON file using the Import from file option

steps.title: Configure Supabase Connection
steps.description: Set up Supabase credentials in each workflow's Supabase nodes

steps.title: Configure OpenAI API
steps.description: Add OpenAI API key to the OpenAI nodes in each workflow

steps.title: Activate Workflows
steps.description: Toggle each workflow to Active status

steps.title: Test RAG Endpoints
steps.description: Test each crew member's RAG webhook endpoint

test_commands.captain_picard:
# Test Captain Jean-Luc Picard RAG workflow
curl -X POST https://n8n.pbradygeorgen.com/webhook/crew-captain-jean-luc-picard \
  -H "X-N8N-API-KEY: your-api-key" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"query": "Test query for Strategic Leadership & Mission Command"}'
